translations: n.霓虹灯；氖（10号元素，符号 Ne）

sentences.sentence: Only use neons in artistic illustrations.
sentences.translation: 仅使用霓虹灯艺术插图。

sentences.sentence: I can't sleep because neons are too bright.
As user interface elements or text neons are unsettling at best.
sentences.translation: 由于用户界面元素或文本的霓虹灯是令人不安的最好。
